Kalekye Mumo bụ onye mgbasa ozi Kenya na onye na-agụ egwu.
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọrụ nnọchiteanya obodo Turkey ma mesịa rụọ ọrụ na HomeBoyz
Mgbe ahụ, ọ kwagara na mmepụta ụda dị ka injinia ụda maka Madeva TV
98.4 Capital FM were ya n'ọrụ dị ka onye na-elekọta nri ụtụtụ ma mesịa bụrụ onye Kiss FM were ya dịka onye nchịkọta akụkọ na onye na-agụ akwụkwọ

N'afọ 2016 ọ hapụrụ kiss FM ma were ya n'ọrụ dị ka onye na-egosi K24 TV ruo afọ abụọ.  Ọ hapụrụ mgbasa ozi mgbe ọ nọrọ na ya ruo afọ 13 ka o wee nwee ike ilekwasị anya na ụlọ ọrụ PR ya. E bidoro ụlọ ọrụ PR ya na Villa Rosa Kempinski na afo 2016.
